nodes.text: The Cheruba system was located in the Rifle Worlds, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected to the Charubah and Relephon systems via the hyperlane known as the Gallinore Reach. The Cheruba system shared its name with the competitions known as the Cheruban glach races.
The Cheruba system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it within grid square O-9.
